title: [Forbidden Hills, Grasslands]
description: A light layer of dew covers the green foothills, causing the grass to shine whenever the moonlight hits it a certain way.  Every so often, an owl flies by, perhaps heading back to the woods from a hunt.

A light layer of dew covers the green foothills, causing the grass to shine whenever the sunlight hits it a certain way.  Every so often, a colorful parrot flies by, perhaps heading towards the heavily wooded area near the mountain.
